reviewText:
Soccer teams will find this DVD helpful.
Coaches who are looking for additional drills
for their practices should consider this more
than adequate program.

Easy to follow at home soccer drills.
Quality skills throughout the program.
Soccer moms,dads,coaches,leagues and kids will love this.
A Great Program!

Finally one of soccer's most underrated skills is talked about and made into a useful video. If you are involved in a soccer league as a coach, parent or league official and you're only going to buy one video, it should be SOCCER FAST FOOTWORK DRILLS.
A SOCCER VIDEO MASTERPIECE!

This is a wonderful video/DVD exploring the benefits of creative drills players can do in their own backyard as well as on the soccer field. The level of detail is energizing. This comprehensive instructional guide for players and coaches alike teaches the techniques necessary for success as well as games and drills to hone your skills to perfection. Anyone who coaches within the youth level through high school should make BACKYARD SOCCER DRILLS part of their soccer resource library.
VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

A one of a kind DVD that gives wonderful soccer skill instruction.
Soccer is made up more than shooting and this DVD really does a more than credible job with ball handling drills in a confined area. Getting by your defender is explained in detail.
EXCELLENT DRILLS & TECHNIQUES! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Highly impressive program combining some great soccer drills with very good quality video production.  No doubt new as well as experienced soccer players will learn from this!

Soccer drills and techniques that can be done in confined areas make this soccer video a "Must Have" product for soccer coaches, parents,leagues and schools. The drills are creative. The techniques are explained in detail.
The video production values make it easy to view.
Coaches looking to improve their team's overall skills will love product.
A GREAT SOCCER RESOURCE THAT IS VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

For soccer players ages 7-18 you cannot go wrong practicing the content provided in BACKYARD SOCCER DRILLS. Great fundamentals and techniques.
Young players will enjoy the introduction to some of the drills. Experienced school players will love the competitive drills! This is the real deal. Great production values make it an easy to follow program with less talk and more action. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

This is one of the most creative videos I have ever seen! I came across Marty Schupak's videos by way of another sport and I was very satisfied. I became my daughter's soccer coach and wanted to learn all I could about this great game. BACKYARD SOCCER DRILLS had been a savior for me the last two years. The drills offered are excellent for confined areas but can also be used with the team concept on the field. My daughter watches this video over and over again. The video covers: fast footwork drills,shooting drills,passing drills,heading techniques,volley drills,bonus tips and more! I have also shared this program with other members of my team and have seen improvement six games into the season. The brilliance of all of Marty Schupak's work is 2 key elements of learning; assure player success and novelty. If you are involved in soccer at any level, this program is a must! A REAL SCOOOOOOOOORE!!!!

This DVD is a breath of fresh air to my soccer coaching career. One of the few soccer resources that go into depth with one of the most underrated aspects of soccer, footwork drills. This video (DVD) goes above and beyond the basics. The production values are excellent! The brilliance of this program is the simplicity in the explanations and the quantity of relevant soccer drills that are shown. If you coach soccer from the youth level all the way up to competitive travel teams, you will love this program.
A MUST FOR ANY SOCCER COACHES RESOURCE LIBRARY! A SCORE!

Really learned alot from this video as I myself never played soccer and have a U10 boys team I coach. We are playing better than ever and the boys have really enjoyed the drills they have been taught!

The video offers many useable soccer skill drills. It demonstrates and narrates the action adequately so that you understand the skill drill enough to teach it properly. I would definitely recommend this video especially to new soccer coaches.

As far as soccer DVDs go, this is #1 on my list of valuable resources. A rare opportunity for soccer players to take advantage of some fundamentally sound drills that will help teams get into a position to score. Soccer footwork skills are really the bridge that leads teams to be in a position to succeed. This program is clear, concise and easy to understand. Very highly recommended! These popular soccer titles by Marty Schupak are also available on Amazon's Video On Demand program for as low as $2.99. Championship Soccer Drills Backyard Soccer Drills 34 Soccer Goalie Drills Soccer Shooting Drills Soccer Fast Footwork Drills Advanced Soccer Drills

Continued soccer fun with drills that create polished skills.
As a followup to CHAMPIONSHIP SOCCER DRILLS, this at home program
does a great job promoting good soccer drills with key techniques attached!

My 8-year old daughter is on her third year of AYSO soccer this year.  She loved watching the video and right away wanted to grab her ball and start practicing some of the techniques.  I believe it provides more than enough dribbling drills to keep a child in this age group challenged.  It also motivates them to watch how good experienced players can become.  The video footage is clear and easy to watch and the narrator speaks slowly and is easy to follow.  The variety of genders and age groups in the player/demonstrators keeps all age groups engaged.

How often do we get to combine insight into a sport that also teaches us how to have fun! BACKYARD SOCCER DRILLS has all of the best aspects of soccer that players can take to any level they want. The narration and production values really add to this fine video. Very much recommended! These popular soccer titles by Marty Schupak are also available on Amazon's Video On Demand program for as low as $2.99. Championship Soccer Drills Backyard Soccer Drills 34 Soccer Goalie Drills Soccer Shooting Drills Soccer Fast Footwork Drills Advanced Soccer Drills

SOCCER FAST FOOTWORK DRILLS shows why fundamentals are key at all levels of soccer play. Michael Jordan used to practice dribbling for hours. Derek Jeter practices his fielding range everyday. It is no coincidence that the premier athletes are fundamentally sound players. This should translate to players at most levels and we soccer coaches and parents need to motivate these players to see why basic soccer fast footwork skills are important. This video really does a very good job explaining the skills that players need to succeed. Highly recommended! This DVD is part of this popular 6 DVD soccer set available on Amazon. Soccer Coaching:Schupak's Soccer 6 Pack DVD Set

Some very relevant soccer drills combined with stimulating instruction. The positive results of this video (DVD) have been confirmed with my own kids. If one looks beyond the drills offered in this video, you can create your own with the ideas given. This dynamic soccer video should be viewed by youth players as well as the competitive travel team player. Improvement is almost a guarantee but you have to practice! This is recommended! Soccer coaches & parents also liked this DVD set comprised of six programs. Soccer Coaching:Schupak's Soccer 6 Pack DVD Set

Skepticism at first, confidence later. I am always suspicious of videos or books that are getting unbelievable 5 star reviews. Is the author or producer part of a large extended family? Does Amazon own a percentage? Well this program, SOCCER FAST FOOTWORK DRILLS is perhaps the best program in a very good series of soccer videos. Footwork skills will translate into excellent shooting opportunities. This program fits a wide variety of soccer programs including recreational up to the most competitive school team. Parents will also gain valuable teaching techniques. This works! Soccer Coaching:Championship Soccer Drills This reviewer also gave this other soccer program a positive review. Soccer Training:Backyard Soccer Drills This reviewer also gave this other soccer program a positive review. Soccer Coaching:Soccer Shooting Drills This reviewer also gave this other soccer program a positive review.

If you are a soccer lover, this program has some nice drills that your son and daughter will enjoy. They will also get to harness their soccer skills and improve their game. An excellent product! Soccer Coaching:Championship Soccer Drills This reviewer also gave this other soccer program a positive review.
Given to Grandson and was useful
I was very pleased with the drills here to develop skills.  Will definitely use this for many years.
This excellent produced video has a litany of superior fundamental drills for both recreational and travel team soccer
Like it
good book.

I found these drills to be very useful though the skill level seems to be fairly high toward the later drills.  I would recommend maintaining use of the earlier parts for a good while before moving onto the more advanced techniques provided here.  Still a very good place to start when it comes to ball control and conditioning.
GREAT. CAME AND WORKS AS EXPECTED.
I like that you can practice these drills in a confined or small space. I think they have improved my daughter's team in a week or two.

This video is a backyard production. Or that quality, the price could have been cheaper. A few important techniques are  covered but without a clear and concise understanding of the basics - it's a little hard to follow. If you are a coach and have played for years - this is a great video to use as an add on to your training. It reinforces a few important techniques!
Great training aid for a new player to the game..Helps with basic skills, and short drills emphasizing how the game is played
